paragraphs.text: Boom! This makes you look like a ‘what’s under the hood’ kind of designer. You’re someone who wants to see the guts of a website. To go a step further resize to ipad and change something of the existing site , double boom!! Your colleague will leave your desk thinking you’re a bloody design wizard.

paragraphs.text: My GA was as I stated, funnily enough. She was the best. Sorry to hear yours wasn’t so good. Did you do the part time course? Cheers for the read and note.

694f81b987e4.title: My General Assembly teacher and assistants were awesome, but they were also half my age.

paragraphs.text: My General Assembly teacher and assistants were awesome, but they were also half my age. They would sooner brag that they had students (or *a* student: me) that designed websites for Netscape browsers.
paragraphs.name: b748

661b5e65778.title: You have no idea, how critical №13 really is.

paragraphs.text: You have no idea, how critical №13 really is. As an Asian dude, I wish I could grow my facial hair out so I can sport a handlebar mustache. If only so I could twirl the ends of said mustache while using №13.
Please excuse me I now must rotate my stock of artisan pickles.
paragraphs.name: c510

ed6ffe7393f7.title: I didn’t say they weren’t good.

paragraphs.text: I didn’t say they weren’t good. I’d definitely recommend the program to others though I’m pretty sure there’s already been staff turnover. I took the part time front end development program in Boston to get caught up. I had been in a position working with ColdFusion for 8 years! I needed to catch up.
paragraphs.name: 172b
